list.title: New Machine for making extra wide nonwoven rolls
list.content: In order to provide wider range of product for our customers, our new machine for producing extra wide nonwoven rolls has been set up. The fabric is welded by glue and the maximum width can be up to 19.2m. Extra wide nonwoven rolls are commonly used in agriculture field, such as plant cover, greenhouse cover, weed control etc. When using in agriculture, nonwoven fabric can protect plants and crops from insects, frost, and maintain a stable temperature for yield improvement. Whatâ€™s more, we also produce fabric with anti-uv treatment which can use the fabric for longer time.Nan Qi Xing is producing pp nonwoven fabric of different grammages and width. With high quality material and anti-UV masterbatch, the fabric is durable for agriculture.Welcome to contact us for more details.
